TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LostFocusEventManager extends System.Windows.WeakEventManager

summary.span: 提供 實作，讓您能夠使用「弱式事件接聽程式」模式附加 或 事件的接聽程式。

span.span: Provides a implementation so that you can use the "weak event listener" pattern to attach listeners for the or events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要在此模式中的接聽程式，接聽程式物件必須實作。In order to be listeners in this pattern, your listener objects must implement . 您不需要實作是事件來源類別上。You do not need to implement on the class that is the source of the events. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 資料繫結會使用此以便連接接聽程式，以更新繫結的內部類別或繫結的目標物件上的事件。 data binding uses this so that internal classes that update bindings can attach listeners for a or event on an object that is the target of a binding. 這種情況支援通知模式的資料繫結，而不需要建立強式參考的資料繫結目標。This supports notification for the mode of data binding, without creating strong references to data binding targets.

summary.span: 加入指定的事件處理常式，當指定的來源引發 或 事件時，就會呼叫這個處理常式。

span.span: Adds the specified event handler, which is called when specified source raises the or event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法來指定您想要用來訂閱事件處理常式或事件...Use this method to specify the event handler you want to use to subscribe to the or event.. 當您使用這個方法時，接聽程式物件不需要實作介面。When you use this method, your listener object does not need to implement the interface.

span.span: Begins listening for the event on the given source, attaching an internal class handler to that source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 型別以查看它是否會檢查提供的來源或，然後將適當的事件的類別處理常式加入至該來源。The provided source is checked for type to see if it is or , and then adds the class handler for the appropriate event to that source.
